name: Beat: The Game
storyline: Beat is out on an unusual mission: To protect Eddie from any harm that might get in the way, as he goes through a robot factory that has gone cuckoo! That's because Eddie must deliver a special item to Mega Man, who is at the risk of having a "Game Over", and Eddie's teleportation system has been beaten up!
summary: Beat: The Game is a Mega Man fangame that puts Beat into the spotlight for once! As the robotic bird, you must peck any rogue robot that threatens to hurt Eddie! The trip is only one level long, but you can always try to beat your own high-score! There's also an original, chiptune soundtrack courtesy of Cadet!
